description.value:
Wondrous item, common
Cat burglars, gearworkers, locksmiths, and even street performers use this gooey substance to increase the sensitivity of their hands. When found, a container contains 1d4 + 1 doses. As an action, one dose can be applied to a creatureâ€™s hands. For 1 hour, that creature has advantage on Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) checks and on tactile Wisdom (Perception) checks.
